channel.title: CVE Feed for Orthanc -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Orthanc -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-7238|2024-01-23T19:20:02.324Z -- orthanc -- osimis%20dicom%20web%20viewer
item.description: A XSS payload can be uploaded as a DICOM study and when a user tries to view the infected study inside the Osimis WebViewer the XSS vulnerability gets triggered. If exploited, the attacker will be able to execute arbitrary JavaScript code inside the victim's browser.
